title: Roast squash and sweet potato soup with buttermilk blue cheese sauce
description: I have to have a regular supply of this squash and sweet potato soup at Christmas - it really is one of my freezer favourites.
ingredients: 1 butternut squash, unpeeled, halved, seeds scraped out, sliced into 2.5cm/1in x 2.5cm/1in cubes
500g/1lb 2oz sweet potatoes, unpeeled, cut into 2.5cm/1in thick rings
salt and freshly ground black pepper
